description:
This beautiful new build home is currently undergoing construction and presents as a perfect opportunity for first home buyers, investors or downs sizers looking to get into the market and purchase a brand new, low maintenance home in a great location. Ideal for those buyers willing to take advantage of the potential stamp
duty savings and incentives for first home buyers. The home presents with a unique and modern facade from the front and offers a well designed and practical floor plan throughout the interior, it features four bedrooms, two bathroom, study nook, open plan living/kitchen/dining plus a double car garage. Situated in a quiet court location being only minutes to Epsom Village Shopping Centre, recreational facilities, schools, medical practice, childcare and train station. This home represents outstanding value- don't miss out.
